comments.body:
> react-motion doesn't export the config interface

If I'm not mistaken, it exports it here:
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/6e3c284a47b9e9aeb925e6488e8825bc13808057/types/react-motion/index.d.ts#L11

Ah, I read that type wrong ðŸ˜¬ 

What works for me is:

```
import { OpaqueConfig } from "react-motion"
// ...
springConfig?: OpaqueConfig
```

but I'm only passing react-motion presets to react-collapse.
Yeah neither are quite exactly right. I wasn't sure whether to redefine `SpringHelperConfig` completely or not, and just decided not to.

Aha. The problem I ran into is that passing react-motion presets to react-collapse gave me a type error...

(Thanks for making the type definition though, by the way!)
